title: Kangalile Lyrics Pencil Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Pencil Kangalilae Song Lyrics
Singers : Shreya Ghosal & Javed Ali
Movie : Pencil

Kangalile kangalile
Oru Kadugalavu therigiradhe
En mele en mele
Un kuru kuruppu neligiradhe.

Kallai Kulathinil aerindhaai
En nenjiil valayangal seidhaai.
Oh thalli nadandhida virumbi
Nee mella aruginil vandhaai

Melaadai thodumo...
...padumo
Kai viral thodumo
Kaal nagam padumo.

Pattaadai illaamal
Oru pottum illaamal
Nee vandhu nindraalum
Unpole varumo.

Kangalile kangalile
Oru Kadugalavu therigiradhe
En mele en mele
Un kuru kuruppu neligiradhe.

Vanna udaigalail nee vandhaal
En ennam sidharudhu penne .
Ennai maraithitta podhum
Adhai kaati koduppadhu kanne

Orupuram nee
Marupuram naan
Idaiyinil yaar.
Vetkam thaduppadhai paar.

Engae naan sendraalum
Enpaatil sendraalum
Kannaale yaen vandhaai
Pesaamal yaen sendraai.

Karkaalam pol indru
Sangeetha Sol ondru.
Nee veesi sendraalum
Podhaadhu enakku.

Kangalile kangalile
Oru Kadugalavu therigiradhe
En mele en mele
Un kuru kuruppu neligiradhe.
